name: Qingyun City
desc: A bustling metropolis with a dense population and a gathering of merchants. This place is an important venue for trading heavenly materials and earthly treasures and seeking opportunities.

name: Shazhou City
desc: A major trade town in a desert oasis where various caravans assemble, serving as an important supply and exchange point for cultivators.

name: Cuilin City
desc: A major cultivation town deep in the forest where many cultivators reside, an ideal place for cultivation and artifact refining.

name: Canglan City
desc: Located at the delta where a large river enters the sea, where hundreds of rivers return to the ocean and water transport flourishes; it is a precious land most frequently visited by water-attribute cultivators.

name: Lanyue City
desc: Standing at the peak of continuous mountains, shrouded in mist all year round with pure spiritual qi, an excellent place for ascetic practitioners to comprehend the Heavenly Dao.
